mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARD ( CARD_NO, CARD_NAME, CARD_TYPE, CARD_BRAND, VIEW_COUNT, ANNUAL_FEE, ISSUEDTO, SERVICE, S_SERVICE, CARD_STATUS, CARD_URL, CARD_SLOGAN, CARD_NOTICE, REG_DATE, EDIT_DATE ) VALUES ( CARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cardName}, #{cardType}, #{cardBrand}, #{viewCount}, #{annualFee}, #{issuedTo}, #{service}, #{sService}, #{cardStatus}, #{cardUrl}, #{cardSlogan}, #{cardNotice}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
